issues.message: Missing line feed at file end
issues.sourceListing:
﻿mixin TasksViewer(statesSimulations)

  -
    /**
     * @type {object}
     * @property {boolean} loading
     * @property {boolean} error
     * @property {boolean} noItems
     * @property {boolean} noSearchResults
     */  
    statesSimulations = statesSimulations ?? {}
 
  .TasksViewer&attributes(attributes)

    +TasksGroupsTreeManager.TasksViewer-Sidebar
      
    .TasksViewer-TopActionBar

      +SearchBox--YDF({
        placeholder: "課題の見出しや記述で検索"
      }).TasksViewer-TopActionBar-SearchBox

      +Button--YDF.TasksViewer-TopActionBar-ButtonForWideContainers
        +Person__Plus--YDF_Icon.Button--YDF-SVG_Icon
        span.Button--YDF-Label 新規課題先追加
      
    if statesSimulations.loading

      .TasksViewer-CardsFlow

        each cardNumber in Array.from(new Array(12).keys())

          +TaskCardLoadingPlaceholder

    else if statesSimulations.error

      +AttentionBox--YDF({
        decoration: AttentionBox__YDF.DecorativeVariations.error,
        hasPrependedSVG_Icon: true
      }).TasksViewer-AttentionBox

        p 情報取得中不具合が発生しました。

        +Button--YDF({
          label: "再試験"
        }).AttentionBox--YDF-CenteredButton

    else if statesSimulations.noItems

      +AttentionBox--YDF({
        decoration: AttentionBox__YDF.DecorativeVariations.guidance,
        hasPrependedSVG_Icon: true
      }).TasksViewer-AttentionBox

        p 現在、課題が一件も登録させていません。

        +Button--YDF({
          label: "早速追加しましょう！",
          decoration: Button__YDF.DecorativeVariations.accented
        }).AttentionBox--YDF-CenteredButton

    else if statesSimulations.noSearchResults

      +AttentionBox--YDF({
        decoration: AttentionBox__YDF.DecorativeVariations.guidance,
        hasPrependedSVG_Icon: true
      }).TasksViewer-AttentionBox

        p 検索結果と合っている件はありません。

        +Button--YDF({
          label: "検索条件をリセット",
        }).AttentionBox--YDF-CenteredButton

    else

      ul.TasksViewer-CardsFlow

        each task in DummyData.Tasks

          +TaskCard({
            task,
            rootElementTag: "li"
          })
            
    .PeopleViewer-BottomActionBarForNarrowContainers

      +Button--YDF
        +Person__Plus--YDF_Icon.Button--YDF-SVG_Icon
        span.Button--YDF-Label 新規課題先追加
        
      +Button--YDF
        +Filtering__Outlined--YDF_Icon.Button--YDF-SVG_Icon
        span.Button--YDF-Label フィルタリング
